channel.title: Connection
channel.description:
Ok, thanx to moparscape i can no longer play on ANY private servers.
I go to moparisthebest.com, and all my windows close when it begins to load.
I try using moparscape 3.0, and my version was shut down.
[code] [12:07:17] News: MoparScape 3.1 is now released, download it from [12:07:17] News: http://www.moparisthebest.com.moparisthebest.com [12:07:17] News: Or use the webclient at moparisthebest.com [12:07:17] News: I am now shutting down your moparscape 3.0 [12:07:17] News: [12:07:17] News: -moparisthebest Press any key to continue... [/code]
I try using moparscape 3.1, i get this error: [code] [12:07:17]Downloading file... [12:07:18]You lost connection while downloading the cache. Please Download it manually from: http://www.moparisthebest.com/cache/cache.zip and extract the file to your C:/Windows/.mpr_file_store_32/ folder. Then restart MoparScape. Press any key to continue...[/code]
I downloaded the cache and extracted it to my C:/Windows/.mpr_file_store_32/ folder and i restarted my moparscape, but i still get that message.
Then on rs-server.net the server connect button was taken away, and the online webclient there was shut down. WTF do i do now!!! I am completely miserable now!

@runingman1 wrote:

Download moparscape 3.2
It works fine

item.description:
@Trickery123 wrote:

[quote=“S.A.H.U. Haxor, post:4, topic:17421”]god, my mopar 3.1 doesnt work
Baracuda, where do i get another client then?[/quote]

DUDE i have one thing to tell you…
YOU’RE SCREWED!!!
If moparscape 3.1 dont work there gonna have to make a new 3.2 moparscape. And ill ask them if they can.Which i dont think they can.They can make it. I just dont think they have the time[br][size=1]Posted at: October 09, 2006, 02:31:04 PM[/size][hr]Whoa!Baracuda.Yo. You got some posts in damn!

I have 199 188 Were helping posts. the last post were screw offs.

item.title: Connection
item.dc:creator: @S.A.H.U_Haxor S.A.H.U. Haxor
item.description:
@S.A.H.U_Haxor wrote:

Ok, thanx to moparscape i can no longer play on ANY private servers.

I go to moparisthebest.com, and all my windows close when it begins to load.

I try using moparscape 3.0, and my version was shut down.

[12:07:17] News: MoparScape 3.1 is now released, download it from
[12:07:17] News: http://www.moparisthebest.com.moparisthebest.com
[12:07:17] News: Or use the webclient at moparisthebest.com
[12:07:17] News: I am now shutting down your moparscape 3.0
[12:07:17] News:  
[12:07:17] News: -moparisthebest
Press any key to continue...

I try using moparscape 3.1, i get this error:

[12:07:17]Downloading file... [12:07:18]You lost connection while downloading the cache. Please Download it manually from: http://www.moparisthebest.com/cache/cache.zip and extract the file to your C:/Windows/.mpr_file_store_32/ folder. Then restart MoparScape. Press any key to continue...

I downloaded the cache and extracted it to my C:/Windows/.mpr_file_store_32/ folder and i restarted my moparscape, but i still get that message.

Then on rs-server.net the server connect button was taken away, and the online webclient there was shut down. WTF do i do now!!!
I am completely miserable now!
